name: brat_capacity
description: The existing number of beaver dams per unit of riverscape length that the riverscape can support

name: brat_hist_capacity
description: The historic number of beaver dams per unit of riverscapes length that the riverscape could support based on modeled historic vegetation

name: brat_risk
description: Categorical values of risk that beaver dam building activity could pose to human infrastructure

name: brat_opportunity
description: Categorical values of beaver-related restoration and conservation opportunities

name: brat_limitation
description: Categorical natural and anthropogenic limitations on beaver dam building

name: brat_complex_size
description: The number of dams the section of riverscape could support

name: brat_hist_complex_size
description: The number of dams the section of riverscapes could historically support based on modeled historic vegetation

name: dam_setting
description: Beaver dam setting (classic, steep, floodplain)

name: ownership
description: Dominant ownership within the DGO

name: state
description: The dominant US state within the DGO

name: county
description: The dominant county within the DGO

name: drainage_area
description: The drainage area of the primary channel in the DGO

name: watershed_id
description: The 10-digit USGS watershed Hydrologic Unit Code

name: stream_name
description: The name of the primary stream in the DGO

name: stream_order
description: Strahler Stream Order of the primary stream in the DGO

name: headwater
description: zero if not a headwater, one if a headwater

name: stream_length
description: Sum of stream segment lengths (NHD flow lines) within the DGO

name: waterbody_type
description: The NHD FCode of waterbody within the DGO

name: waterbody_extent
description: The area of waterbody within the DGO

name: ecoregion3
description: EPA Ecoregion Level 3

name: ecoregion4
description: EPA Ecoregion Level 4

name: elevation
description: The minimum elevation in the DGO

name: geology
description: The dominant geology type within the DGO

name: huc12
description: The 12-digit USGS watershed Hydrologic Unit Code

name: prim_channel_gradient
description: The gradient of the primary channel in the DGO

name: valleybottom_gradient
description: The gradient of the riverscape centerline

name: rel_flow_length
description: Sum of stream lengths in the DGO divided by length of valley centerline

name: confluences
description: Number of anabranch confluences within the DGO

name: diffluences
description: Number of anabranch diffluences within the DGO

name: tributaries
description: Number of tributary confluences within the DGO

name: tribs_per_km
description: The number of tributaries per unit of riverscape length.

name: planform_sinuosity
description: Sum of river length divided by the valley bottom length within moving window.

name: lowlying_area
description: The area of valley bottom classified as 'low_lying' within the DGO

name: elevated_area
description: The area of valley bottom classified as 'elevated' within the DGO

name: channel_area
description: The area of active channel within the DGO.

name: floodplain_area
description: The area of active floodplain within the DGO.

name: integrated_width
description: The width of the riverscape

name: active_channel_ratio
description: The proportion of the riverscape that is active channel

name: low_lying_ratio
description: The proportion of the riversape that is relatively low-lying surface

name: elevated_ratio
description: The proportion of the riverscape that is relatively elevated surface

name: floodplain_ratio
description: proportion of the riverscape that is floodplain (low-lying + elevated; not channel)

name: acres_vb_per_mile
description: Area of valley bottom per riverscape length

name: hect_vb_per_km
description: Area of valley bottom per riverscape length

name: channel_width
description: Width of the primary channel in the DGO

name: confinement_ratio
description: The ratio of channel length that abuts a confining margin to the total channel length

name: constriction_ratio
description: The ratio of channel length constricted by confining margins on both sides to total channel length

name: confining_margins
description: The length of confining margins within the DGO

name: constricting_margins
description: The length of constricting margins (confining on both sides of the channel simultaneously) within the DGO

name: qlow
description: Low flow value of the primary channel in the DGO

name: q2
description: Typical flood (Q2) flow value of the primary channel in the DGO

name: splow
description: Low flow stream power

name: sphigh
description: Typical flood (Q2) stream power

name: road_len
description: Length of roads within the DGO

name: road_dens
description: Length of roads per length of riverscape centerline

name: rail_len
description: Length of railroads within the DGO

name: rail_dens
description: Length of railroads per length of riverscape centerline

name: land_use_intens
description: Land use intensity from 0 (None) to 100 (High) within the DGO

name: road_dist
description: The minimum distance between roads and river channels

name: rail_dist
description: The minimum distance between railroads and river channels

name: div_dist
description: The minimum distance between diversion points and river channels

name: canal_dist
description: The minimum distance between canals and river channels

name: infra_dist
description: The minimum distance between any infrastructure and river channels

name: fldpln_access
description: The proportion of flooplain accessible to the channel (e.g., via lateral migration)

name: access_fldpln_extent
description: The area of the accessible floodplain

name: lf_evt
description: The dominant Landfire EVT classes

name: lf_bps
description: The dominant Landfire BpS classes

name: lf_agriculture_prop
description: The proportion of agricultural cover in the riverscape

name: lf_agriculture
description: The area of agricultural cover in the riverscape

name: lf_conifer_prop
description: The proportion of conifer cover in the riverscape

name: lf_conifer
description: The area of conifer cover in the riverscape

name: lf_conifer_hardwood_prop
description: The proportion of mixed conifer-hardwood cover in the riverscape

name: lf_conifer_hardwood
description: The area of mixed conifer-hardwood cover in the riverscape

name: lf_developed_prop
description: The proportion of the riverscape that is developed

name: lf_developed
description: The area of the riverscape that is developed

name: lf_exotic_herbaceous_prop
description: The proportion exotic herbaceous cover in the riverscape

name: lf_exotic_herbaceous
description: The area of exotic herbaceous cover in the riverscape

name: lf_exotic_tree_shrub_prop
description: The proportion of exotic tree and shrub cover in the riverscape

name: lf_exotic_tree_shrub
description: The area of exotic tree and shrub cover in the riverscape

name: lf_grassland_prop
description: The proportion of grassland cover in the riverscape

name: lf_grassland
description: The area of grassland cover in the riverscape

name: lf_hardwood_prop
description: The proportion of hardwood forest cover in the riverscape

name: lf_hardwood
description: The area of hardwood forest cover in the riverscape

name: lf_riparian_prop
description: The proportion of riparian vegetation cover in the riverscape

name: lf_riparian
description: The area of riparian vegetation cover in the riverscape (from LandFire)

name: lf_shrubland_prop
description: The proportion of shrubland cover in the riverscape

name: lf_shrubland
description: The area of shrubland cover in the riverscape

name: lf_sparsely_vegetated_prop
description: The proportion of the riverscape that is sparsely vegetated

name: lf_sparsely_vegetated
description: The area of the riverscape that is sparsely vegetated

name: lf_hist_conifer_prop
description: The historic proportion of conifer cover in the riverscape

name: lf_hist_conifer
description: The historic area of conifer cover in the riverscape

name: lf_hist_conifer_hardwood_prop
description: The historic proportion of mixed conifer-hardwood forest in the riverscape

name: lf_hist_conifer_hardwood
description: The historic area of mixed conifer-hardwood forest in the riverscape

name: lf_hist_grassland_prop
description: The historic proportion of grassland in the riverscape

name: lf_hist_grassland
description: The historic area of grassland in the riverscape

name: lf_hist_hardwood_prop
description: The historic proportion of hardwood forest in the riverscape

name: lf_hist_hardwood
description: The historic area of hardwood forest in the riverscape

name: lf_hist_hardwood_conifer_prop
description: The historic proportion of mixed hardwood-conifer forest in the riverscape

name: lf_hist_hardwood_conifer
description: The historic area of mixed hardwood-conifer forest in the riverscape

name: lf_hist_peatland_forest_prop
description: The historic proportion of peatland forest in the riverscape

name: lf_hist_peatland_forest
description: The historic area of peatland forest in the riverscape

name: lf_hist_peatland_nonforest_prop
description: The historic proportion of non-forested peatland in the riverscape

name: lf_hist_peatland_nonforest
description: The historic area of non-forested peatland in the riverscape

name: lf_hist_riparian_prop
description: The historic proportion of riparian vegetation in the riverscape

name: lf_hist_riparian
description: The historic area of riparian vegetation in the riverscape

name: lf_hist_savanna_prop
description: The historic proportion of savanna in the riverscape

name: lf_hist_savanna
description: The historic area of savanna in the riverscape

name: lf_hist_shrubland_prop
description: The historic proportion of shrubland in the riverscape

name: lf_hist_shrubland
description: The historic area of shrubland in the riverscape

name: lf_hist_sparsely_vegetated_prop
description: The historic proportion of the riverscape that was sparsely vegetated

name: lf_hist_sparsely_vegetated
description: The historic area of the riverscape that was sparsely vegetated

name: ex_riparian
description: Area of existing riparian vegetation (as calculated by RCAT, which includes additonal landfire categories)

name: hist_riparian
description: Area of historic riparian vegetation (as calculated by RCAT, which includes additonal landfire categories)

name: prop_riparian
description: The area of existing riparian cover divided by the area of the riverscape

name: hist_prop_riparian
description: The area of historic riparian cover divided by the area of the riverscape

name: riparian_veg_departure
description: Ratio of existing riparian vegetation cover over historic riparian vegetation cover. This is often expressed or symbolized as departure from historic which is 1 minus this value. Value of -9999 means valley too narrow to sample.

name: ag_conversion
description: The proportion of historic riparian vegetation converted to agriculture

name: develop
description: The proportion of historic riparian vegetation converted to developed

name: grass_shrub_conversion
description: The proportion of historic riparian vegetation converted to grass-shrubland

name: conifer_encroachment
description: The proportion of historic riparian vegetation converted to conifer

name: invasive_conversion
description: The proportion of historic riparian vegetation converted to invasive vegetation

name: riparian_condition
description: A riparian condition index from (0) poor to (1) intact based on riparian vegetation departure, land use intensity, and floodplain accessibility

name: geom
description: Well-known-binary (WKB) representation of the DGO Polygon

name: level_path
description: the NHD level path, which is a unique identifier for each stream from its origin to its end in the NHDPlusHR dataset

name: seg_distance
description: (From VBET) the distance along a given level path that the IGO is located (used for toplogical purposes)

name: centerline_length
description: The length of valley centerline

name: segment_area
description: the area of the DGO polygon

name: fcode
description: The NHD Feature Code representing flow type of the primary channel

name: rme_project_id
description: Project ID for the source metric engine project on Riverscapes Data Exchange, data.riverscapes.net

name: rme_date_created_ts
description: Timestamp of date RME project was created

name: rme_version
description: RME Version as string, e.g. 1.3.4

name: rme_version_int
description: RME Version as integer e.g. 10
